title: Emerald and Diamond Openwork Gold Jhumka Earrings - "Paccha Kalla Jhumkalu"
materials: Cultured Pearls (Mutyalu). Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: These exquisite Jhumka earrings showcase intricate openwork detailing, typical of South Indian temple jewelry. The earrings feature a floral motif topper, centered with a striking emerald and surrounded by brilliant Polki diamonds. The bell-shaped Jhumka is adorned with a delicate filigree pattern embellished with Polki diamonds, and accented with rubies. Dangling from the base are luminous cultured pearls, adding a touch of elegance and movement. The openwork design enhances the overall brilliance and allows light to pass through the gemstones, maximizing their sparkle.
colors: Primarily gold with vibrant green emeralds
and luminous white diamonds and pearls. The gold provides a warm
while the gemstones add pops of contrasting color.
occasions: and cultural celebrations. Ideal for a Seemantham ceremony
or any event where you want to showcase your rich heritage.
description: These Jhumkas blend traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The exceptional craftsmanship and the use of high-quality gemstones make this a valuable and timeless piece. The openwork design and pearl drops offer a lightweight and comfortable wear. This is a statement piece embodying cultural richness and refined aesthetics.
